comments:
I20070410-1043

1. Set a line breakpoint anywhere
2. Right click on the breakpoint
3. Breakpoint Properties...
Is:

at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:938)

When opening the breakpoint properties page with no condition (translates to a null condition), we were passing the null straight into Document#set(), which we should not be doing.

Provided simple fix to HEAD to call Document#set() with the empty string if a the initial condition is null.

changes to BreakpointConditionEditor
